description: Display the System Properties dialog box
Minimize all windows and display the desktop
Cycle through applications on the taskbar
Start or view the program pinned to taskbar in the position of the number
Start a new instance of the program pinned to taskbar in the position of the number
Move current window to the left half of the screen
Move current window to the right half of the screen
Search for a file or folder
Open dialog box to lock screen / change user / sign off / change password / open task manager
